dialogue: Can you believe a vendor tried to come in here with no face mask?
I told him it didn't matter what kind of face covering he used, it only mattered that he had one.
This is where my tale takes a dark turn.
Now peeved, the vendor stormed back to his car, where he had a bagged lunch.
He angrily removed the plastic wrap from his sandwich.
And wrapped it around his head to serve as his face mask.
